descriptionHtml:
Changed The Ritual Stone effect to last forever (999 days) and multiple uses a day.

If you want to raise an army of the undead that will follow you to the end of the world you will be satisfied with this mod (hopefully).

Warning: Extremely Overpowered!!! And Really Fun!!

This is my first and meant it for myself. It\'s nothing special really but hey if I was looking for it maybe someone else will be too, might as well upload.

If anyone has any problems just say so.

Extract to Data Folder, you know the drill. I don\'t exactly know if downloading with manager works. As I said, my first time.
author: MrBones1102
